text:
You told me I should have called the police all those times to stop the abuse, that is exactly what I am doing now. I am not tolerating any abuse to me
anymore.
Message 397 of 4024
I am free 9am through 6pm. Pick at time for arrival.
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:50 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:52 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 398 of 4024
Please don’t do this. I did not say that. I am not accusing you of anything. Please. I asked not to discuss it at all. Please! I told you we can discuss.
Please don’t do this.
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:52 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:55 AM)
Subject:Re: Language and tone
Message 399 of 4024
I have to discuss it. Please call. I’m trying now. It will take 30 seconds
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:52 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:55 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 400 of 4024
Christine- please give me 30 seconds. I didn’t want to talk about the other. You insisted. I want to finish the Lugg. Please don’t do this.
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:58 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 08:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 401 of 4024
Given the gravity of the situation and harm done, especially what I shared were Adrian’s concerns about what happened, I am surprised you turned
up at the game acting as if everything is fine.
What happened was a serious violation of the boys and I privacy and treating it as just another day, and a conflict between you and I is unnerving.
Sent:01/14/2024 at 08:04 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 08:06 PM)
Subject:Adrian game  tonight
